paragraphs: Senior AI Engineer and Technology Consultant with 13+ years delivering AI systems, speech/NLP solutions, and real-time simulation platforms across healthcare, industrial, and entertainment domains. Former CTO at Blockville, leading AI and 3D teams to build scalable automation pipelines.

I design, train, and deploy end-to-end AI: ASR, LLMs, TTS; on-device inference; cloud orchestration. I bridge product strategy with hands-on engineering to deliver measurable impact (automation, latency, cost).

experience.summary: Condensed highlights from over a decade of building production AI and immersive systems.

entries.description: Implemented AI pipelines for generative media and healthcare data processing, automating >60% of manual workflows; engineered on-device LLM/TTS inference (mobile/WebGL) with >90% cost reduction; built multilingual speech/phoneme systems (Arabic-centric tuning).
Architected real-time LLM/TTS stacks for on-device use (quantization + caching); developed multi-agent coordination for AI personas; automated 3D content pipelines (>70% faster).
Delivered industrial digital twins (training/planning); modular simulation components; AI-assisted automation for camera pathing/segmentation.
